div.p: CAN WE TAKE IT, MR. SCOTT?

IN THIS PART OF THE GALAXY.
IF WE SHOW IT A CLOSEUP

ALL DECKS REPORT TO ME HERE.

WHAT ARE THE LOT OF YOU
I'D LIKE TO CHECK IT OUT,
AND THEN IT MET THE OTHER.
I SUSPECT IT IS ABOUT TO

p.span: ARE OUT ALL OVER THE SHIP.

div.p: WE'VE GOT TO GET RID OF IT
